General.Name: XIIlab Co. Ltd.
General.Description: XIIlab Co.,Ltd provides software and services based on big data analysis technology. The company operates under the xDAMS: Vision, Xdlms, Uyuni, X-labeller, and Xdams brand names. It also provides big data education service. XIIlab Co.,Ltd was founded in 2010 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
